Packages 
Package Description
classifier
A package that serves as a blue print for the development of classifiers.
datamodel
A package that implements interfaces and classes related to saving counts extracted from training data
datamodel.categories
A package that implements interfaces and classes related to saving counts extracted from training data - more specifically, the data of features, for example X1, X2, X3
datamodel.classifications
A package that implements interfaces and classes related to saving counts extracted from training data - more specifically, the classifications themselves like "blue", "green",...
exceptions
A package that implements some exceptions specific to the program execution
graph
A package that implements a simple graph library.
graph.edge
A package that implements the edge class to be used by the SimpleWeightedEdge.
graph.search
This package implements the Kruskal algorithm for MST calculation for the SimpleWeightedGraph
main
The main package.
main.tests
This sub-package contains tests made to the submodules of the program.
metrics
A package that implements simple metrics such as accuracy score, confusion matrix, F1 score, specificity score and sensitivity score.
metrics.perclass
A package that implements simple metrics such as accuracy score, confusion matrix, F1 score, specificity score and sensitivity score among others, considering only individual classes.
parser
A package that implements a "dumb parser", and the facades to interact with the parser
parser.facades
A package that implements the facades to interact with the parser
score
A package that implements the LL and MDL scores to be used in the structure learning of a classifier
utils
A package that implements util functions that don't really belong anywhere
